occupation: Senior Partner Manager, Tech Alliances  at Ada
headline: Helping Brands Deliver Automated CX & Drive Revenue at Scale | Partnerships @ Ada

experiences.title: Co-Founder, Marketing and Sales
experiences.description:
• Identify gaps and opportunities in the cannabis accessory/storage landscape through market 
   segmentation, product and advertising testing, competitive analysis, and consumer insights. 
• Developed branding strategies to place CannaConscious as a premium brand that speaks to 
   today’s modern consumer in a consistent manner across multiple mediums
• Manage the company's social media accounts and create promotional material with emphasis 
   placed on brand continuity
• Increase brand awareness and customer retention through grassroot marketing efforts, co-branding, sponsorship and event marketing, email marketing, and online advertising techniques  
• Leverage analytical and digital advertising tools to direct traffic to website and online marketplace listings.
• Solidify strategic partnerships with some of Canada’s largest distributors and online marketplaces in the cannabis landscape
• Work with distributors and manufacturers to build forecasted sales models to ensure minimum inventory is kept
• Oversee logistic scheduling of imported goods

experiences.title: Account Executive
experiences.description:
• Own and manage a full sales cycle, selling into Universities and Colleges across North America
• Drive revenue by selling Top Hat’s SaaS platform and applications directly to professors and 
   departments
• Book meetings and run on-campus meetings/demonstrations to secure new business 
   opportunities across North America
• Develop and execute strategies to leverage existing customers to assist with acquiring new 
   business and achieve weekly and monthly KPI’s as well as campaign objectives. 
• Work closely with members of Inside Sales and Enterprise Sales teams to find the right 
   approach to ensure a great customer experience and to maximize revenue growth

experiences.title: Account Executive
experiences.description:
• Present and sell media space to existing and prospective customers
• Construct and maintain positive working relationships with clients  
• Understand and resolve customer grievances to ensure satisfaction 
• Keep abreast of current and upcoming promotional trends
• Visit clients to evaluate advertising needs and present potential solutions

experiences.title: Applied Business Project - Food Soveregnity For Nishnawbe Aski Nations
experiences.description:
• Developed a business case illustrating the positive affects of using renewable energy to power a greenhouse in a Northern climate for First Nation communities (focused on solar energy)
• Developed and completed a cost analysis based on a number of working variables to determine feasibility of the project. These variables included efficiency of the PV system, site location, the system's array area, average temperature and precipitation, and other losses that affect energy output. 
• Assisted with developing a robust strategy to allow northern communities achieve food sovereignty.

experiences.title: Student Internship Program - Global Wealth Management
experiences.description:
• Research and analyze financial information
•  Compliance monitoring and reporting
•  Attended meetings alongside upper management 
•  Prepared regulatory compliance documents and assisting with the credit process by participating in transaction analysis
•  Performed due diligence and risk analysis
